document.full_text: a new caddie, two bogey-free rounds and the chip of a lifetime on the final hole were all brittany lincicome needed to end a two-year victory drought on the l.p.g.a. tour.
document.title: brittany lincicome wins shoprite l.p.g.a. classic
lines_and_colors: a new caddie, two bogey-free rounds and the chip of a lifetime on the final hole were all brittany lincicome needed to end a two-year victory drought on the l.p.g.a. tour.
